column4: Provide information about and support analysis using vehicle history information for vehicles involved in a crash event.
Integrate with the West Virginia DMV vehicle registration system and the R.L. Polk Vehicle Identification Number Analysis  software to obtain vehicle specific data.
Store, display and utilize vehicle manufacturer, make, model.
Store, display and utilize year manufactured.
Store, display and utilize motor vehicle body type.
Allow authorized users to make adjustments to vehicle history information within the ERP safety management function to support  required data corrections.
